org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer

  • Packages that use org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer 
    Package Description

  • Classes in org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer used by org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer 
    Class and Description
    BeanTupleQueryDefinition
    Type-safe implementation of JPA 2.0 Tuple-based query definition.
    BeanTupleQueryFactory
    Create a query based on a query definition.
    BeanTupleQueryView
    Wrapper around the LazyQueryView.
  • Classes in org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer used by org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer 
    Class and Description
    BeanTupleContainer
    BeanTupleContainer enables using JPA 2.0 Tuple type-safe queries with lazy batch loading, filter, sort and buffered writes, and supports joins where more than one entity is returned (as is the case with joins).
    BeanTupleItemHelper
    Query that returns a Tuple
    BeanTupleQueryDefinition
    Type-safe implementation of JPA 2.0 Tuple-based query definition.
    BeanTupleQueryFactory
    Create a query based on a query definition.
    BeanTupleQueryView
    Wrapper around the LazyQueryView.
  • Classes in org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer used by org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainersample 
    Class and Description
    BeanTupleContainer
    BeanTupleContainer enables using JPA 2.0 Tuple type-safe queries with lazy batch loading, filter, sort and buffered writes, and supports joins where more than one entity is returned (as is the case with joins).
    BeanTupleQueryDefinition
    Type-safe implementation of JPA 2.0 Tuple-based query definition.
  • Classes in org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer used by org.vaadin.addons.criteriacore 
    Class and Description
    BeanTupleQueryDefinition
    Type-safe implementation of JPA 2.0 Tuple-based query definition.
